Articles.Content:
Hello everybody. I've encountered strange bug in my career. I'm playing heavy modded (15K+ patches in cashe) KSP, but it istn't about mods, because unmodded version encouters the same bug. It's about current savegame and continous version migration: I've started it on 1.2, but the bug appears just on 1.7. New game started on 1.7 is free from this bug.

So the bug itself: after switching a craft using any way, except Control Room, the game locks as if you click on some object and didn't choose an option. Saves don't save, menus don't function. You can do nothing, but control current craft or quickload (the only way to unlock the game back). Technically, the game is playable, but jumping to Control Room every time I want to switch a craft is a bit annoying.

Maybe someone can figure out, what's wrong in my saves...

https://uploadfiles.io/g9ixrds6
